metadata.title: CVE-2018-16418 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow when handling string concatenation in util_acl_to_str intools/util.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able tosupply crafted smartcards to cause a denial of service (application crash)or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: opensc package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
